local_intent: Execute grasp on the drawer handle using precomputed 'handle_grasp' and verify a stable hold.
assumptions: Grasp pose 'handle_grasp' is already computed and the end-effector is pre-aligned/open.
coherence_with_global: Matches GLOBAL_BT where ComputeGraspPose precedes Pick; this subtree performs Pick using 'handle_grasp' and checks IsGraspStable.
